text: The Kaami people are a Nepali ethnic group. They are found almost everywhere in Nepal, but are less common in the Eastern region than the west. There are many castes inside Kaami people like Rishal, Nagarkoti, Sunar, etc. Rishal main occupation is working on gold and silver."Online caste ethnicity Data" by the Government of Nepal at http://cbs.gov.np/image/data/Population/CasteEthnicity/Caste%20Ethinicity%20Population.pdf == References == Category:Nepal
title: Kaami people
